Method Detail

fastSum

public void fastSum(java.lang.Object one,
                    java.lang.Object two)
Adds to the second matrix the first matrix. The addition process is component by component x[i,j] = x[i,j] + other[i,j] for all i=1..n and j=1..m The result of the operation is stored in the first matrix.

Specified by:
fastSum in class Addition
Parameters:
one - The first matrix
two - The matrix to be added

fastSubstract

public void fastSubstract(java.lang.Object one,
                          java.lang.Object two)
Substracts a matrix from the first matrix. The substraction process is component by component. The substraction process is component by component x[i,j] = x[i,j] - other[i,j] for all i=1..n and j=1..m The result of the operation is stored in the first matrix.

Specified by:
fastSubstract in class Addition
Parameters:
one - The first matrix
two - The matrix to be substracted
